TopicTitle: My second page of topics are deleted

Articles.Content:
http://i58.tinypic.com/w7hspc.jpg

My second page of my topics have been deleted. Good job.

Moved over to Kerbal Network, the place for forum-related questions.

Which search terms are you using to get that result? I have noticed that sometimes the forum software messes up page counts, and the last page has no results on it.

Edit: Something is going on with how vB is counting started threads. I just looked at another user, the results were one page showing "Results 1 to 9 of 12".

Edit2: Tried this on a bunch more users, including myself, almost every one of them showed erroneous results. Is there a specific thread you remember starting that can no longer be found, roarke?

Edited October 23, 2015 by Red Iron Crown
Sorry, i don't remember how many threads i hame made, but it was two pages nevertheless. Thank you for the help.
It is ok now. I can see the second page now.
